title: People Holding Hands Medium Light Skin Tone Dark Skin Tone
description: Represents a diverse couple or pair of friends holding hands, signifying unity, partnership, or a ropersontic relationship. The specific skin tones indicate a pairing of medium-light and dark skin.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the people-holding-hands emoji beautifully illustrates connection and unity, featuring two individuals with distinct medium-light and dark skin tones holding hands. Apple’s masterful use of smooth gradients and soft rounded edges creates a warm, inclusive visual, with subtle highlights suggesting genuine interaction. This emoji, a testament to Apple’s commitment to diverse representation, is perfect for expressing friendship, romance, solidarity, or partnership.
